snippet: Crystal Palace moved closer to survival and left Norwich City sweating over their immediate future as Jason Puncheon's goal ended a 14-match sequence without a Premier League win....

headline.main: Palace End 14-Match Winless Streak to Ease Fears
headline.print_headline: Palace End 14-Match Winless Streak to Ease Fears

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace moved closer to survival and left Norwich City sweating over their immediate future as Jason Puncheon's goal ended a 14-match sequence without a Premier League win.

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy has been voted Footballer of the Year by the Football Writers' Association (FWA)....

headline.main: Leicester's Vardy Named Football Writers' Player of the Year
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Vardy Named Football Writers' Player of the Year

lead_paragraph: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy has been voted Footballer of the Year by the Football Writers' Association (FWA).

snippet: Arsenal's resurgent Alexis Sanchez scored twice to help ease their top-four jitters in a 2-0 victory over West Bromwich Albion in the Premier League at a less than full Emirates Stadium on Thursday....

headline.main: Sanchez Double Lifts Arsenal Into Third Place
headline.print_headline: Sanchez Double Lifts Arsenal Into Third Place

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's resurgent Alexis Sanchez scored twice to help ease their top-four jitters in a 2-0 victory over West Bromwich Albion in the Premier League at a less than full Emirates Stadium on Thursday.

snippet: Winger Modou Barrow has signed a new three-year deal with Swansea City which will keep him at the club until June 2019, the Premier League club said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Winger Modou Barrow has signed a new three-year deal with Swansea City which will keep him at the club until June 2019, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Leicester City stumbled in its pursuit of the Premier League title as it was held to a draw by visiting West Bromwich Albion....
abstract: Leicester City ties West Bromwich Albion, 2-2; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Leicester City stumbled in its pursuit of the Premier League title as it was held to a draw by visiting West Bromwich Albion.

snippet: Premier League strugglers Sunderland have completed the signing of Tunisia international Wahbi Khazri from French club Girondins Bordeaux for an undisclosed fee, the club said on Saturday....

headline.main: Sunderland Complete Signing of Tunisian Khazri
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Complete Signing of Tunisian Khazri

lead_paragraph: Premier League strugglers Sunderland have completed the signing of Tunisia international Wahbi Khazri from French club Girondins Bordeaux for an undisclosed fee, the club said on Saturday.

snippet: Liverpool striker Divock Origi is set for a month on the sidelines after undergoing surgery on a knee problem as the club's injury woes continue, British media reported on Tuesday....

headline.main: Liverpool's Origi Out for a Month After Knee Surgery
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Origi Out for a Month After Knee Surgery

lead_paragraph: Liverpool striker Divock Origi is set for a month on the sidelines after undergoing surgery on a knee problem as the club's injury woes continue, British media reported on Tuesday.

snippet: Nice have signed striker Mario Balotelli from Liverpool, the clubs said on Wednesday, with British media saying the Italy international has moved on a free transfer....
lead_paragraph: Nice have signed striker Mario Balotelli from Liverpool, the clubs said on Wednesday, with British media saying the Italy international has moved on a free transfer.

snippet: Crystal Palace forward Emmanuel Adebayor is unsure of whether he will extend his contract with the Premier League club, but hopes to sign off on a high note by beating Manchester United in the FA Cup final if he does leave....

headline.main: Palace's Adebayor Wants FA Cup Win to Seal His Time in England
headline.print_headline: Palace's Adebayor Wants FA Cup Win to Seal His Time in England

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace forward Emmanuel Adebayor is unsure of whether he will extend his contract with the Premier League club, but hopes to sign off on a high note by beating Manchester United in the FA Cup final if he does leave.

snippet: Eden Hazard said he was eager to recapture the form he displayed in Chelsea's title-winning 2014-15 campaign to help the club recover from the disappointments of last season and bring the Premier League trophy back to Stamford Bridge....

headline.main: Hazard Keen to Recover Title-Winning Form for Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Hazard Keen to Recover Title-Winning Form for Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Eden Hazard said he was eager to recapture the form he displayed in Chelsea's title-winning 2014-15 campaign to help the club recover from the disappointments of last season and bring the Premier League trophy back to Stamford Bridge.
